name: Simple Mask
specifications: Molded soft plastic clear mask; adjustable elastic strap; oxygen inlet; fits most adults and older children.
function: Delivers moderate concentrations of oxygen to spontaneously breathing patients.
usage: Wash hands; place mask over patient's nose and mouth; secure with strap; connect oxygen tubing; adjust flow rate as ordered.
maintenance: Use a clean mask for each patient; monitor for skin irritation; check fit to prevent oxygen leaks.
warning: Reusing disposable masks, using the wrong flow rate, or leaving the mask too loose, decreasing effectiveness.
